channel.title: Driftless and Wild
channel.itunes:author: Teala Amberg
channel.itunes:summary: Driftless and Wild is a podcast about reclaiming childhood through outdoor play, simple living, and wild learning. Hosted by Teala — a Minnesota mama, special education teacher, and nature enthusiast — each episode explores how to raise curious, confident kids who thrive outside. From dirt to discovery, this is your space for stories, tips, and encouragement to help your family live wildly and root deeply.

item.title: Episode 2: Let Them Be Wild – Camaraderie, Curiosity & Calm
item.itunes:author: Teala Amberg
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Driftless & Wild, Teala reflects on two powerful weeks of wildschooling, where the children’s natural camaraderie, curiosity, and calm shone through.
item.description: In this episode of Driftless & Wild, Teala reflects on two powerful weeks of wildschooling—where the children’s natural camaraderie, curiosity, and calm shone through. With zero behavior issues and endless exploration, this episode weaves personal experience with research on outdoor play, risky movement, and neurological development.

item.title: Episode 3: Food, Feelings & Finding Balance
item.itunes:author: Teala Amberg
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Driftless & Wild, Teala shares how mindful eating, outdoor play, and embracing all weather can help bring calm, joy, and balance to childhood and beyond.
item.description: In Episode 3, Teala explores the powerful connection between food, behavior, and the simple magic of outdoor play—plus how to find balance even on the busiest days.

item.title: Episode 4: Self-Care Starts with You
item.itunes:author: Teala Amberg
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Driftless & Wild, Teala explores why prioritizing self-care as a parent is not selfish — it’s essential. Learn how journaling, movement, nourishment, sunshine, and intentional living ripple out to benefit your children and your whole home rhythm.
item.description: Teala reflects on the importance of modeling self-care and authentic emotional regulation as a parent. From simple moments of rest to mindful routines, this episode helps you reclaim your role as a regulated, rooted adult raising resilient kids.

item.title: Episode 5 - Start Scared, Stay Wild
item.description: This episode explores the importance of doing things that scare us as a form of modeling bravery, growth, and wild freedom for our kids. Plus, Teala shares easy summer play ideas that cost nothing and require no travel.
